LanguageData.VG_LumberIronwood.label: ironwood lumber
LanguageData.VG_LumberIronwood.description: Processed ironwood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Ironwood is a very durable and beautiful hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberApple.label: applewood lumber
LanguageData.LumberApple.description: Processed applewood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Applewood is a nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberCherry.label: cherrywood lumber
LanguageData.LumberCherry.description: Processed cherrywood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Cherrywood is a moderate to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberDatePalm.label: date palm lumber
LanguageData.LumberDatePalm.description: Processed date palm lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Date palm is a durable wood.
LanguageData.LumberFig.label: figwood lumber
LanguageData.LumberFig.description: Processed figwood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Figwood is a low to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberOrange.label: orangewood lumber
LanguageData.LumberOrange.description: Processed orangewood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Orangewood is a perishable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberPeach.label: peachwood lumber
LanguageData.LumberPeach.description: Processed peachwood lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Peachwood is a low to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberCoconut.label: red palm lumber
LanguageData.LumberCoconut.description: Processed red palm lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Red palm is a durable wood.
